name: urequire
description: JavaScript Universal Module Converter: write modular code once, convert to UMD or single `.js` and run/test on AMD (browser/requirejs) & nodejs.
readme:
# uRequire v0.4.2

### The JavaScript Universal Module Converter

All documentation is moved to the wiki and http://urequire.org
